citation.article-title: Proposal of Giesbergeria voronezhensis gen. nov., sp. nov. and G. kuznetsovii sp. nov. and reclassification of [Aquaspirillum] anulus, [A.] sinuosum and [A.] giesbergeri as Giesbergeria anulus comb. nov., G. sinuosa comb. nov. and G. giesbergeri comb. nov., and [Aquaspirillum] metamorphum and [A.] psychrophilum as Simplicispira metamorpha gen. nov., comb. nov. and S. psychrophila comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Simplicispira psychrophila comb. nov.
Simplicispira psychrophila (psy.chro.phiâ€²la. Gr. adj. psychros cold; L. adj. philos loving; N.L. fem. adj. psychrophila cold-loving).
The description is identical to that given for Aquaspirillum psychrophilum by Hylemon et al. (1973).
